Name: Alev
Description:
Alev was stabbed in the heart by a man who approached as a potential customer.

Name: Vanessa Huaspa
Description:
Vanessa's body was found in a state of putrefication an appartment in Azuay, in downtown Cuenca. She had previously told her friends that she suffered physical and psychological abuse by her partner.

TvT project: Silueta X Association & Confirmado.net, 04.12.2015

https://siluetax.org/2015/12/04/asesinan-a-transexual-en-cuenca-transsexual-murdered-in-cuenca-ecuador/

Name: C. Torres
Description:
The victim was arrested when she was with her partner and taken to a police station, where she allegedly died beaten by the police.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & RCN Radio, 05.12.2015

Name: Alecia dos Santos de Jesus
Description:
Alecia was run over by a car and the driver never stopped.

Description:
Kesley was run over by a car and later beaten with a wooden bat on her face and chest.

Description:
Layana was found on the floor with multiple stab wounds.

Description:
Gina was assaulted by a person she'd already had previous problems. The assailant was arrested.

Description:
P. was found dead on Vicente Guerrero street in the town of Pueblo Viejo. She had been hit over the head with a stone.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Diario de Morelos, 16.12.2105

Name: Brenda Lee
Description:
Brenda was found half-naked on her bed with head injuries. An office chair nearby was found with bloodstains and her car had been stolen.

She was known In her city for her activism, and was due to have graduated in Psychology three days later.

TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Diario Popular, 16.12.2015

https://noticias.r7.com/cidades/fotos/famosa-travesti-e-morta-a-cadeiradas-em-pelotas-18122015#!/foto/1

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim's body was found on a city bridge.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & Entorno Inteligente, 15.12.2015

Name: Rayssa Rangell
Description:
Rayssa was found dead with headshots.

TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Folha Metropolitana, 21.12.2015

Name: Paulete
Description:
The perpetrator had a relationship with Paulete for 3 years. According to him, the fight that concluded in Paulete's death was because he wanted sex and she didn't.

TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & SAD sem Censura, 20.12.2015

Name: Shayla Gonçalves Moreira
Description:
Shayla was found at the margins of the river with several bruises on her face.

TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & G1 Globo online, 21.12.2015

Name: Joana
Description:
Allegedly, when customers realized that Joana was trans, they killed her and threw her from a car into the street.

TvT partner organisation Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans & El Sol de Toluca, 21.12.2015

Name: J. Andrade de Almeida
Description:
The victim was approached by a man on a car. She got into the car and minutes later she got out, already stabbed.

TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & O Popular, 22.12.2015

Name: Mel Pereira de Almeida
Description:
Mel's body was found  in an advanced state of decompositionon the afternoon of Sunday 3rd January in a ditch approximately 3 meters deep on the banks of a secondary road of BR-060, Bairro Santo Antônio de Lisboa. Her throat had been cut.

Reportedly she had previously been threatened with death by persons unknown.

TvT partner organisation Grupo Gay da Bahia & Patrulha RV, 05.01.2016

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was stabbed in the neck by her nephew with a screwdriver.

TvT partner organisation APTN & The National, 11.01.2016

Name: Phoebe Titus
Description:
Phoebe was stabbed in the neck by a 15-year-old youth in broad daylight after an argument. Hers was the second reported LGBTI murder in the area in a month.

At around midday on 27th December at around midday Phoebe went with a neighbour’s child to an informal shop in the town of Wolseley to buy iced lollies.

According to reports received by LGBTI rights group Triangle Project while there she accidentally stepped on the toes of a 15-year-old boy at the store. The furious youth responded by allegedly shouting homophobic and transphobic slurs, including “vuil moffie” (dirty faggot) at her.

After being repeatedly verbally abused by the teen, Titus told a friend’s mother across the road from the shop that she was “sick of being called names.” Annoyed, the woman picked up a plastic crate and gestured with it to the youth.

It’s alleged that a man in his twenties near the shop then handed a knife to the boy, who  plunged it into Phoebe’ neck.

Bleeding profusely, she staggered away, collapsing and dying about 500 metres down the road in a pool of blood.

> “I think she’d just had enough of being called names,” an emotional Sharon Cox, Triangle’s Health and Support Services Manager, told Mambaonline. “She was beautiful and was loved in the community. She was a hairdresser in Wolseley at the time of her death, and was a friend to many. Everybody knew her.”

TvT project: Mamba Online, 12.01.2016

http://www.mambaonline.com/2016/01/12/western-cape-trans-woman-knifed-death-15-year-old-homophobe/

http://www.mambaonline.com/2017/09/01/lives-cheap-transgender-womans-killer-goes-free/

Photo: Entries shown in black appear in the TGEU list.
Entries shown in blue were identified from other direct reports.
